noFieldContent.information: It looks like you haven't added any fields yet

addFieldModal.requirements: To add a field, provide the field name, it's area and select the soil class.

validation.fieldNameRequired: Field name must be filled in
validation.fieldNameLength: Field name can contain a maximum of 45 characters
validation.fieldAreaRequired: Field area must be filled in
validation.fieldAreaRange: Field area must be within the range of 0.00 to 999.99

fieldResults.tooltip: Click on the filed to go to crop management
